name: Mannequin (dutchlish)
description:
Download Windows build for best experience. Browser version should also be fine on most browsers.

The lower the frequency of the sound wave, the closer you are to your target. Walk into targets to progress.

Made to be played with audio, though there is an option for visual clues if audio is not available or you struggle to hear differences in frequency.

AWSD to move, Left Shift to sprint.

Credits:

Animations and character: https://www.mixamo.com/

Music: https://freesound.org/people/Drakensson/sounds/647367/

All sounds from freesound.org under creative commons license.

Font Source Sans Pro  (Google fonts)

Invector 3rd person controller: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/game-toolkits/third-person-controlle...
